tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_demographics (
  player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name STRING,
  age INT,
  gender STRING,
  country STRING,
  game_preferences JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE game_preferences (
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    rating INT,
    genre VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_demographics(player_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_demographics (
    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE game_preferences (
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    rating FLOAT,
    favorite BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_id)
)

CREATE TABLE personalized_recommendations (
    player_id UUID,
    recommended_game_id UUID,
    score FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, recommended_game_id)
)

CREATE TABLE player_demographics (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    country VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE game_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_category VARCHAR,
    gameplay_hours INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_demographics(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    rec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    recommended_game_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_demographics(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (recommended_game_id) REFERENCES game_catalog(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name STRING,
    age INT,
    gender STRING,
    location STRING
);

CREATE TABLE player_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES players(player_id),
    game_id INT REFERENCES games(game_id),
    rating INT,
    last_played_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE player_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES players(player_id),
    game_id INT REFERENCES games(game_id),
    review_text STRING,
    review_date DATE
);
